info.title: Responsibility Management Team Configurations - Read
info.description: You can read team categories, team types, responsibility attributes, functions assigned to team categories, and responsibility attributes and functions assigned to team types. Each of these entities supports filtering of their properties and the properties of their associations. If you have any problems trying to read these entities because of authorizations or the given filter criteria, the system displays error messages in the response.

x-sap-shortText: Read details about team configurations in Responsibility Management using this synchronous inbound service
